quote: Banality is like boredom: bored people are boring people, people who think that things are banal are themselves banal.Interesting people can find something interesting in all things.
quote_letters: BANALITY IS LIKE BOREDOM BORED PEOPLE ARE BORING PEOPLE PEOPLE WHO THINK THAT THINGS ARE BANAL ARE THEMSELVES BANALINTERESTING PEOPLE CAN FIND SOMETHING INTERESTING IN ALL THINGS
